title: OpenAI Secures Pentagon Deal for Classified AI Deployment After Trump Dumps 'Woke' Anthropic
description: Sam Altman's OpenAI reached an agreement with the Department of War to deploy its AI models on classified networks, just hours after the Trump administration ordered the federal government to "immediately cease" using Anthropic AI following a battle for control of the artificial intelligence model.

title: Jobs Long Handled By Humans May Soon Require Fewer Workers: Amazon CEO
description: Artificial intelligence will lead to job losses while simultaneously giving rise to fresh employment opportunities, Amazon CEO Andy Jassy said.

content:

title: From doctors to taxi drivers: AI could replace eight million jobs - is yours at risk?
